name: CoinIdolcom(Unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Unofficial app to read the latest headlines from CoinIdol.com 

CoinIdol is an international crypto and currencies media outlet focusing on the latest news about Bitcoin and altcoins, Blockchain and distributed ledger technology solutions, FinTech and financial innovations on the world's market.

All information and rights belong to CoinIdol.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
